segments.text: I had a ham sandwich with mayonnaise for lunch .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Maybe the food had something wrong with it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It could be bad food , but I didn ’ t feel so well yesterday , either .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Have you been under a lot of pressure lately ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I haven ’ t been under any more stress than usual .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Perhaps you have caught that bug that is going around .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I feel like maybe I am coming down with the flu .
segments.speaker: S2
